summary: This bill, the "Semiquincentennial Congressional Time Capsule Act," directs the Architect of the Capitol to create a time capsule for the 250th anniversary of the United States. Bipartisan congressional leadership will jointly determine the contents, which will include legislative milestones, a message to the future, and other commemorative items. The capsule is to be buried on the West Lawn of the U.S. Capitol by July 4, 2026, and will be sealed until it is opened by the 244th Congress on July 4, 2276. It is a commemorative and bipartisan effort.
